title: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro 'charged with five misdemeanors' relating to domestic violence incident
text:
It was revealed on Wednesday that Ronnie Ortiz-Magro won't face any felony charges stemming from his recent domestic violence incident with baby mama Jen Harley.

But the 33-year-old reality TV star was hit with five misdemeanor charges by the L.A. City Attorney for the October incident, according to TMZ on Thursday.

The charges are comprised of 'one count of domestic violence, one count of brandishing a weapon, one count of child endangerment, one count of resisting arrest and one count of criminal threats', reported the gossip site.

Ronnie Ortiz-Magro, 33, was hit with five misdemeanor charges by the L.A. City Attorney for an October domestic violence incident, according to TMZ on Thursday

According to the outlet on Wednesday, the Los Angeles County District Attorney declined to file charges against the Jersey Shore reality star either for domestic violence or for kidnapping.

Ronnie was arrested by LAPD officers on October 4 at a home he was sharing with his on/off partner Jen following a fight.

According to court documents obtained by TMZ, Ronnie allegedly 'slapped and punched Jen' before chasing her around the home with a knife while he was carrying their toddler, Ariana Sky.

The reality star also allegedly told Jen that 'he was going to kill her.'

The site reported that police 'broke down the door' to the Airbnb rental they were living in because they were worried the 18-month-old little girl was in danger.

Ronnie was arrested by LAPD officers on October 4 at a home he was sharing with his on/off partner Jen Harley [seen here in December last year] following a fight

Ronnie reportedly refused to 'go peacefully' and officers used a Taser to take him into custody on suspicion of kidnapping.

Jen was seen in surveillance footage running with Ariana during the fight and knocking on the neighbors door before placing the tot on the ground.

Ronnie was ordered to stay 100 yards away from Jen and Ariana following the altercation but that order was dismissed on October 11 after Jen failed to show up in court.

Ronnie took to social media to share video and photos with his little girl at Disneyland on October 12.

Jen was seen partying in Las Vegas with Farrah Abraham on October 17.
description: The 33-year-old reality TV star was hit with five misdemeanor charges by the L.A. City Attorney for the October incident, according to TMZ on Thursday.
